SEARCH
Package gutek.gui.controllers

Class MainStage

java.lang.Object
gutek.gui.controllers.MainStage
@Component public class MainStage extends Object
Main application stage that manages the display of views and the application menu. It handles view creation and interaction between different components of the GUI.

  • Method Details

    • initStage

      public void initStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Initializes the primary stage and sets its properties.
      Parameters:
      stage - the primary Stage of the application

    • setScene

      public void setScene(MainStageScenes nextScene, Object... nextSceneParams)
      Sets the view in the application based on the provided scene enum. Retrieves the required view using the Spring context and updates the stage.
      Parameters:
      nextScene - The view to display next
      nextSceneParams - Optional parameters for initializing the scene

    • getControllerForScene

      private FXMLController getControllerForScene(MainStageScenes nextScene)
      Retrieves the appropriate controller for the given scene.
      Parameters:
      nextScene - The scene for which to get the controller.
      Returns:
      The corresponding FXMLController, or null if none found.

    • getSceneControllerMap

      private Map<MainStageScenes,Class<? extends FXMLController>> getSceneControllerMap()
      Initializes the mapping between scenes and their corresponding controller classes.
      Returns:
      A map of MainStageScenes to FXMLController classes.

    • loadController

      private void loadController(FXMLController controller, Object... nextSceneParams)
      Loads the controller, sets up the scene, and updates the view.
      Parameters:
      controller - The controller to load.
      nextSceneParams - Optional parameters for initializing the scene.

      public double getStageScaleFactor()
      Retrieves the scaling factor based on the current window size relative to the default dimensions.

      The calculated scaling factor
